Obviously it has it's flaws like every game, but still this is the most competitive any FPS can get. It's hard, it's unforgiving, and you have to learn a lot of things to be good in this game, but it's worth it. No wonder this game has a multi-million dollar e-sport scene, with the biggest organizations.
